text: Antônio Agostinho Marochi (28 August 1925 - 28 January 2018) was a Roman Catholic bishop. He was born in Londrina, Brazil. Marochi was ordained to the priesthood in 1953. He served as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Londrina, Brazil from 1973 to 1976. He then served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Presidente Prudente, Brazil from 1976 to 2002.Diocese of Presidente Prudente Marochi died of respiratory failure in Londrina on 28 January 2018 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:People from Paraná State Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Antônio Agostinho Marochi
